description: Display hero section with main headline 'Launch Your OpenClaw Wrapper Fast', subheadline about revenue potential ($4K-$22K/mo), and primary CTA button. This is the first impression that converts visitors into buyers by immediately communicating value.
steps: Navigate to landing page root URL
Verify headline 'Launch Your OpenClaw Wrapper Fast' is prominently displayed
Verify subheadline mentions $4K-$22K/mo revenue range
Verify 'Get ClawWrapper' CTA button is visible with pricing ($299 crossed out, $99 shown)
Verify scarcity message 'Only 5 spots left at this price' is displayed

description: Show crossed-out original price ($299) with discounted price ($99) and scarcity indicator ('Only 5 spots left'). Creates urgency and perceived value to drive immediate purchase decisions.
steps: Locate pricing section in hero area
Verify $299 is displayed with strikethrough styling
Verify $99 is prominently displayed as current price
Verify 'Only 5 spots left at this price' scarcity message is visible
Verify 'Pay once. Full source code included.' benefit text is shown

description: Display 'Wrappers Making Money Right Now' section with 3 real revenue examples (TrustMRR listings, $4K in 6 days, $22K+ revenue). Provides credibility and demonstrates market validation to overcome buyer skepticism.
steps: Scroll to social proof section
Verify section header 'Wrappers Making Money Right Now' is displayed
Verify TrustMRR marketplace screenshot showing $4K-$22K/mo is visible
Verify dashboard screenshot showing '$4K in 6 days' with 91 subscriptions is visible
Verify SimpleClaw revenue dashboard showing $22K+ total revenue is visible

description: Display testimonial from Marc Lou (indie hacker with $2M+ revenue) saying 'It's OpenClaw wrappers time!'. Leverages authority and credibility from successful entrepreneur to validate the opportunity.
steps: Locate testimonial section
Verify Marc Lou's quote 'It's OpenClaw wrappers time!' is displayed
Verify Marc Lou's name and title are shown
Verify credential 'Indie hacker, $2M+ in revenue from solo products' is visible
Verify profile image or avatar is displayed

description: Show side-by-side comparison of 'Building From Scratch' (2-4 weeks, 9 manual tasks with ✗) vs 'With ClawWrapper' (less than 1 day, 3 simple steps with ✓). Demonstrates time savings and simplicity to justify the purchase price.
steps: Scroll to comparison section with header 'Weeks of Work, or Hours with ClawWrapper'
Verify left column shows 'Building From Scratch' with '2–4 weeks of work' timeframe
Verify 9 tasks are listed with ✗ icons (OAuth, Stripe, Docker, etc.)
Verify right column shows 'With ClawWrapper' with 'Less than 1 day' timeframe
Verify 3 simple steps are listed with ✓ icons and final outcome section

description: Display 'Everything You Need to Ship' section with 8 feature cards (Remote Docker Deployment, Supabase Auth, Stripe Payments, Admin Dashboard, Caddy Proxy, Telegram Bot, Brand Customization, Responsive Design). Communicates comprehensive value and reduces perceived risk.
steps: Scroll to features section with header 'Everything You Need to Ship'
Verify 8 feature cards are displayed in a grid layout
Verify each card has a title, description, and relevant icon/visual
Verify features include: Remote Docker Deployment, Supabase Auth & Database, Stripe Payments, Admin Dashboard
Verify additional features: Caddy Reverse Proxy, Telegram Bot Integration, Full Brand Customization, Responsive & Server-Rendered

description: Display technology stack badges/logos (Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Stripe, Docker, Caddy, Telegram, Node.js). Builds trust with technical buyers by showing modern, proven technologies.
steps: Locate 'Built with' section below features
Verify all 10 technology logos/badges are displayed
Verify logos include: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase
Verify logos include: Stripe, Docker, Caddy, Telegram, Node.js
Verify logos are properly sized and aligned

description: Display detailed pricing card with 'One Price. Everything Included.' headline, $299 crossed out to $99, scarcity message, and complete feature checklist (12+ items). Final conversion point before purchase with all value props consolidated.
steps: Scroll to main pricing section with header 'One Price. Everything Included.'
Verify 'Early-bird: only 5 spots at this price' urgency message is shown
Verify pricing shows $299 crossed out and $99 as current price
Verify 'One-time payment' is clearly stated
Verify complete feature checklist with 12+ items is displayed with checkmarks

description: Display comprehensive checklist of included features in pricing card (source code, OAuth, Stripe, admin dashboard, Docker deployment, Caddy, Postgres, Telegram, white-label, docs, lifetime updates, unlimited products). Removes objections by showing everything included.
steps: Locate feature checklist within pricing card
Verify 'Full Next.js + TypeScript source code (strict mode)' is listed
Verify authentication, payment, and deployment features are listed
Verify 'Lifetime updates, no subscription' is included
Verify 'Unlimited products, clone for each brand' is the final item

description: Display prominent 'Get ClawWrapper' CTA button in pricing section that initiates purchase flow. Primary conversion action for the entire landing page.
steps: Locate 'Get ClawWrapper' button in pricing section
Verify button is prominently styled and easily clickable
Verify button displays current price ($99)
Click button and verify it initiates checkout or purchase flow
Verify button has appropriate hover/active states

description: Display 'Frequently Asked Questions' section with 8 common questions (access after purchase, what's included, developer requirements, comparison to competitors, auth methods, updates, multiple products, refund policy). Addresses objections and reduces purchase friction.
steps: Scroll to FAQ section with header 'Frequently Asked Questions'
Verify section subtitle 'Everything you need to know before you buy.' is shown
Verify 8 FAQ questions are listed
Verify questions cover: access, contents, technical requirements, differentiation
Verify questions cover: auth methods, updates, multiple products, refunds

description: Enable accordion/expandable interaction for FAQ items so users can click to reveal answers. Improves scannability and allows users to find specific information quickly.
steps: Navigate to FAQ section
Click on first FAQ question
Verify answer expands/reveals below the question
Click on another FAQ question
Verify previous answer collapses and new answer expands (or both remain open depending on design)

description: Display final CTA section with 'Stop Building Infrastructure. Start Earning.' headline, reinforcement of revenue potential, pricing, scarcity, and CTA button. Last chance to convert before footer.
steps: Scroll to final CTA section near page bottom
Verify headline 'Stop Building Infrastructure. Start Earning.' is displayed
Verify copy mentions '$4K-$22K/mo' revenue examples
Verify pricing shows $299 crossed out to $99
Verify 'Only 5 spots left at early-bird pricing. Then it's $299.' urgency message is shown

description: Display 'Start Building Now' CTA button in final section that initiates purchase. Captures users who scrolled through entire page and are ready to buy.
steps: Locate 'Start Building Now' button in final CTA section
Verify button shows pricing ($299 crossed out, $99 shown)
Verify button is prominently styled
Click button and verify it initiates checkout flow
Verify button has appropriate hover/active states

description: Display footer with ClawWrapper branding, legal links (Terms, Privacy, License), support link, and product information. Provides necessary legal/support access and reinforces brand.
steps: Scroll to page footer
Verify 'ClawWrapper' branding is displayed
Verify links to Terms, Privacy, License, and Support are present
Click each link and verify it navigates to appropriate page
Verify footer has appropriate styling and layout

description: Display SimpleClaw.com promotional section showing 'Deploy OpenClaw under 1 minute' with comparison table (Traditional 60 min vs SimpleClaw <1 min). This appears to be a related product showcase demonstrating the wrapper's value proposition.
steps: Scroll to SimpleClaw comparison section
Verify headline 'Deploy OpenClaw under 1 minute' is displayed
Verify comparison table shows Traditional method (60 min total) vs SimpleClaw (<1 min)
Verify Traditional column lists 8 steps with time estimates
Verify SimpleClaw column shows simplified process

description: Display 'What can OpenClaw do for you?' section with scrolling/animated carousel of use cases (email management, scheduling, document summarization, expense tracking, etc.). Demonstrates product versatility and helps users envision applications.
steps: Scroll to use cases section with header 'What can OpenClaw do for you?'
Verify subtitle 'One assistant, thousands of use cases' is displayed
Verify multiple use case items are displayed in a grid or carousel
Verify use cases include: email management, scheduling, document tasks, financial tasks
Verify animation or scrolling effect is present (if applicable)

description: Display categorized use cases across different domains: productivity (email, meetings, documents), finance (taxes, expenses, subscriptions), shopping (coupons, price alerts), business (contracts, invoices, leads), and personal (travel, recipes, goals). Shows breadth of application.
steps: Review all use case items in the section
Verify productivity use cases: email summarization, meeting scheduling, document summarization
Verify finance use cases: tax help, expense tracking, subscription management
Verify shopping use cases: coupon finding, price alerts, product comparison
Verify business and personal use cases are represented

description: Display note 'PS. You can add as many use cases as you want via natural language' below use cases. Highlights flexibility and ease of customization for buyers.
steps: Scroll to bottom of use cases section
Verify PS note about natural language customization is displayed
Verify text reads 'PS. You can add as many use cases as you want via natural language'
Verify note is styled distinctly (e.g., italics, different color)
Verify note is positioned after all use case items

description: Display 'Built with ❤️ by Savio Martin' attribution with link to creator. Adds personal touch and credibility, allows users to research creator.
steps: Scroll to footer or bottom section
Verify 'Built with ❤️ by' text is displayed
Verify 'Savio Martin' name is shown
Verify name is clickable/linked
Click name and verify it navigates to creator profile or website

description: Display 'Contact Support' link in footer and SimpleClaw section. Provides customer support access for pre-sale questions and post-purchase help.
steps: Locate 'Contact Support' link in footer
Verify link is clearly visible and styled
Click link and verify it opens email client or support form
Verify link appears in multiple locations if applicable
Verify link has appropriate hover state

description: Ensure entire landing page is responsive and mobile-optimized with proper layout adjustments for smaller screens. Critical since many users browse on mobile devices.
steps: Open landing page on mobile device or resize browser to mobile width
Verify hero section stacks vertically and remains readable
Verify comparison table adapts to mobile layout
Verify feature cards stack appropriately
Verify all CTA buttons remain accessible and tappable

description: Display sticky header with ClawWrapper logo/branding and navigation (if applicable). Provides consistent branding and navigation access as users scroll.
steps: Load landing page
Verify header with ClawWrapper branding is visible at top
Scroll down the page
Verify header remains visible (sticky) or scrolls naturally based on design
Verify header contains logo and any navigation elements

description: Enable smooth scrolling to section anchors when users click navigation links or CTA buttons. Improves user experience and page flow.
steps: Identify any anchor links in navigation or page
Click an anchor link (e.g., to pricing section)
Verify page smoothly scrolls to target section
Verify scroll animation is not jarring
Verify target section is properly positioned after scroll

description: Display loading states or placeholders for images (screenshots, logos, testimonials) while they load. Prevents layout shift and improves perceived performance.
steps: Load landing page with throttled network speed
Verify placeholder or skeleton screens appear for images
Wait for images to load
Verify images replace placeholders smoothly
Verify no significant layout shift occurs

description: Include proper meta tags (title, description, OG tags) for SEO and social sharing. Ensures landing page appears correctly when shared and ranks in search.
steps: View page source or inspect head element
Verify title tag contains relevant keywords (e.g., 'ClawWrapper - Launch Your OpenClaw Wrapper Fast')
Verify meta description is present and compelling
Verify Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:image) are present
Share URL on social media and verify preview appears correctly

description: Display favicon in browser tab for brand recognition. Small but important detail for professional appearance.
steps: Open landing page in browser
Verify favicon appears in browser tab
Verify favicon is clear and recognizable
Open multiple tabs and verify favicon helps identify the page
Verify favicon loads quickly

description: Display hover and active states for all CTA buttons (Get ClawWrapper, Start Building Now) with visual feedback. Improves usability and indicates interactivity.
steps: Locate primary CTA button
Hover mouse over button
Verify button changes appearance (color, shadow, scale, etc.)
Click and hold button
Verify active state is visually distinct from hover state

description: Optionally display countdown timer or dynamic scarcity indicator for 'Only 5 spots left' message. Increases urgency and conversion rate (if implemented).
steps: Locate scarcity message 'Only 5 spots left'
Check if countdown timer or dynamic counter is present
If present, verify timer counts down in real-time
Refresh page and verify timer persists or resets appropriately
Verify timer creates sense of urgency without being misleading

description: Display trust indicators for external links (TrustMRR, revenue screenshots) with proper attribution. Builds credibility by showing real, verifiable data sources.
steps: Locate revenue proof screenshots (TrustMRR, dashboard images)
Verify screenshots are high quality and readable
Verify captions or labels clearly explain what each screenshot shows
If links are present, verify they open in new tab
Verify screenshots appear authentic and unmanipulated

description: Display relevant icons or illustrations for each feature card (Docker icon for deployment, lock for auth, credit card for payments, etc.). Improves scannability and visual appeal.
steps: Navigate to 'Everything You Need to Ship' section
Verify each of 8 feature cards has a relevant icon or illustration
Verify icons are consistent in style and size
Verify icons accurately represent their associated features
Verify icons enhance rather than distract from content

description: Ensure comparison table (Scratch vs ClawWrapper) is responsive and readable on mobile devices. Critical for mobile users to understand value proposition.
steps: Open landing page on mobile device or narrow browser window
Navigate to comparison section
Verify table adapts to mobile layout (stacks vertically or scrolls horizontally)
Verify all text remains readable
Verify checkmarks and X marks are clearly visible

description: Display pricing card with visual emphasis (shadow, border, highlight) to draw attention. Makes the purchase decision point stand out from surrounding content.
steps: Navigate to pricing section
Verify pricing card has visual emphasis (shadow, border, background color)
Verify card stands out from surrounding content
Verify emphasis is not overwhelming or garish
Compare to other page elements and confirm pricing card is most prominent

description: Display avatar/profile image for Marc Lou testimonial. Adds authenticity and human element to social proof.
steps: Navigate to Marc Lou testimonial section
Verify profile image or avatar is displayed
Verify image is high quality and professional
Verify image is properly sized and positioned
Verify image loads quickly

description: Enable click-to-enlarge functionality for revenue screenshots so users can see details. Builds trust by allowing verification of proof.
steps: Locate revenue proof screenshots
Click on a screenshot
Verify screenshot opens in lightbox or modal at larger size
Verify enlarged image is clear and readable
Verify user can close lightbox and return to page

description: Display checkmarks (✓) for all included features in pricing section and comparison table. Visual indicator of what's included vs excluded.
steps: Navigate to pricing feature list
Verify each feature has a checkmark icon
Verify checkmarks are consistent in style and color
Navigate to comparison table
Verify 'With ClawWrapper' column uses checkmarks while 'From Scratch' uses X marks

description: Ensure landing page loads quickly (under 3 seconds) with optimized images and code. Critical for conversion rate and user experience.
steps: Open landing page with network throttling disabled
Measure time to first contentful paint
Verify page loads in under 3 seconds
Verify images are optimized and lazy-loaded where appropriate
Verify no blocking resources delay initial render

description: Implement analytics tracking for page views, CTA clicks, and conversion events. Essential for measuring landing page performance and optimizing conversion rate.
steps: Verify analytics script is present in page source
Navigate through landing page
Click on CTA buttons
Verify events are tracked in analytics dashboard
Verify tracking does not slow down page load

description: Optionally display email capture form for users not ready to buy. Allows follow-up marketing to recover potential customers.
steps: Scan page for email capture form or newsletter signup
If present, verify form is clearly labeled
Enter test email address
Submit form and verify success message
Verify email is captured in marketing system

description: Optionally display exit-intent popup with special offer or email capture when user attempts to leave. Can recover abandoning visitors.
steps: Navigate to landing page
Move mouse cursor toward browser close button or back button
Verify exit-intent popup appears (if implemented)
Verify popup offers value (discount, email capture, etc.)
Verify popup can be easily dismissed

description: Optionally display social share buttons for users to share landing page. Enables word-of-mouth marketing and viral growth.
steps: Scan page for social share buttons
If present, verify buttons for major platforms (Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook)
Click a share button
Verify it opens share dialog with pre-populated text
Verify shared link includes proper OG tags

description: Optionally display live chat widget for real-time support and sales questions. Can significantly increase conversion by addressing objections immediately.
steps: Check for live chat widget in corner of page
If present, click to open chat
Verify chat interface loads properly
Send test message
Verify message is received and response is possible

description: Optionally embed video demo or walkthrough of ClawWrapper setup process. Video can significantly increase conversion by showing product in action.
steps: Scan page for embedded video player
If present, verify video player loads properly
Click play button
Verify video plays smoothly without buffering
Verify video controls (pause, volume, fullscreen) work correctly

description: Display trust badges or security indicators near payment CTA (e.g., secure checkout, money-back guarantee, SSL). Reduces purchase anxiety and increases conversion.
steps: Navigate to pricing/CTA section
Look for trust badges or security indicators
Verify badges are relevant (secure payment, guarantee, etc.)
Verify badges are professionally designed
Verify badges do not appear fake or overused

description: Apply modern gradient backgrounds and visual styling throughout landing page. Creates professional, contemporary appearance that builds trust.
steps: Review overall page design and color scheme
Verify backgrounds use gradients or modern styling
Verify color scheme is consistent throughout
Verify styling enhances rather than distracts from content
Verify page has cohesive, professional appearance

description: Implement clear typographic hierarchy with distinct heading sizes, weights, and spacing. Improves readability and guides user attention through content.
steps: Review all text elements on page
Verify clear distinction between H1, H2, H3 headings
Verify body text is readable size and line height
Verify important text (pricing, CTAs) stands out
Verify typography is consistent throughout page

description: Use appropriate white space and padding between sections. Prevents overwhelming users and improves content comprehension.
steps: Scroll through entire landing page
Verify adequate spacing between major sections
Verify content does not feel cramped or cluttered
Verify spacing is consistent throughout
Verify page feels balanced and easy to scan

description: Ensure CTA buttons have high contrast with background and are immediately noticeable. Critical for conversion as buttons must stand out.
steps: Locate all CTA buttons on page
Verify buttons have high contrast with surrounding elements
Verify button color draws attention
Verify button text is clearly readable
Verify buttons are large enough to be easily clickable

description: Ensure all copy focuses on benefits and outcomes rather than features. Helps users understand 'what's in it for me' and drives conversion.
steps: Read through all major copy sections
Verify headlines focus on outcomes (revenue, time savings)
Verify feature descriptions explain benefits, not just capabilities
Verify copy addresses user pain points
Verify copy uses 'you' language rather than 'we' language

description: Optionally display sticky CTA button at bottom of mobile screen. Keeps purchase option always accessible on mobile devices.
steps: Open landing page on mobile device
Scroll down the page
Verify CTA button remains visible at bottom (if implemented)
Tap sticky CTA button
Verify it initiates purchase flow

description: Optionally provide anchor navigation to jump between major sections (Features, Pricing, FAQ). Improves navigation for users seeking specific information.
steps: Check header or sidebar for section navigation
If present, verify links to major sections (Features, Pricing, FAQ)
Click a navigation link
Verify page scrolls to correct section
Verify active section is highlighted in navigation
